Package by.epam.store.model.service

Interface CatalogService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CatalogServiceImpl
public interface CatalogService
The interface for operations with the product catalog

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean acceptProducts​(java.util.Map<Product,​java.lang.Integer> suppliedProducts)
    Accepts supplied products
    void addProduct​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> productInfo)
    Adds a new product to the catalog
    boolean changeProductData​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> productInfo)
    Changes product data
    java.util.List<ProductCategory> takeAllProductCategories()
    Gives all product categories
    java.util.Optional<Product> takeProductById​(java.lang.String productId)
    Gives a product by id
    java.util.List<Product> takeProductsFromCategory​(java.lang.String categoryId, java.lang.String sortingMethod)
    Gives products from category
    ProductList takeProductsInStock​(java.lang.String page)
    Gives products in stock
    ProductList takeProductsOnOrder​(java.lang.String page)
    Gives products on order
    java.util.List<Product> takeProductsWithName​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String sortingMethod)
    Gives products by the name

  • Method Details

    • addProduct

      void addProduct​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> productInfo) throws ServiceException, InvalidDataException
      Adds a new product to the catalog
      Parameters:
      productInfo - Map of String and String the names of the Product fields and its values
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs
      InvalidDataException - if product info is invalid

    • acceptProducts

      boolean acceptProducts​(java.util.Map<Product,​java.lang.Integer> suppliedProducts) throws ServiceException
      Accepts supplied products
      Parameters:
      suppliedProducts - Map of Product and Integer supplied products and its quantity
      Returns:
      boolean true if products have been accepted, else false
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • changeProductData

      boolean changeProductData​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> productInfo) throws ServiceException, InvalidDataException
      Changes product data
      Parameters:
      productInfo - Map of String and String the names of the Product fields and its values
      Returns:
      boolean true if product data has been changed, else false
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs
      InvalidDataException - if product info is invalid

    • takeAllProductCategories

      java.util.List<ProductCategory> takeAllProductCategories() throws ServiceException
      Gives all product categories
      Returns:
      List of ProductCategory received from database if products are found, else emptyList
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeProductById

      java.util.Optional<Product> takeProductById​(java.lang.String productId) throws ServiceException
      Gives a product by id
      Parameters:
      productId - String product id
      Returns:
      Optional of Product received from database
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeProductsFromCategory

      java.util.List<Product> takeProductsFromCategory​(java.lang.String categoryId, java.lang.String sortingMethod) throws ServiceException
      Gives products from category
      Parameters:
      categoryId - String category id
      sortingMethod - String a way to sort products, can be null if sorting is not needed
      Returns:
      List of Product received from database and sorted when there is a sort method if products are found, else emptyList
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeProductsWithName

      java.util.List<Product> takeProductsWithName​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String sortingMethod) throws ServiceException
      Gives products by the name
      Parameters:
      productName - String product name
      sortingMethod - String a way to sort products, can be null if sorting is not needed
      Returns:
      List of Product received from database and sorted when there is a sort method if products are found, else emptyList
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeProductsInStock

      ProductList takeProductsInStock​(java.lang.String page) throws ServiceException
      Gives products in stock
      Parameters:
      page - String page number
      Returns:
      ProductList received from database if products are found, else emptyList
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs

    • takeProductsOnOrder

      ProductList takeProductsOnOrder​(java.lang.String page) throws ServiceException
      Gives products on order
      Parameters:
      page - String page number
      Returns:
      ProductList received from database
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if DaoException occurs
